reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering, with one noting how it enhances their curves, and appreciate its athletic material that feels soft and stretchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bathing suit like material
items.body: Really great dress, has bathing suit like material so itâ€™s not see through, material is pretty thick and feels like it helps keep you sucked in but, definitely no tummy control. Itâ€™s so cute and flowy. Iâ€™m 5â€™2 and it sits right above my knees-so pretty short! I do think it was worth the price I paid for. Read more
items.author: TaylorB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect date night dress
items.body: I love this dress! The red color looks amazing on my olive tan skin tone, and the neckline is super flattering. It makes my chest look great without being too revealing. I also really like the material since itâ€™s soft and not scratchy. Iâ€™ll definitely be wearing this on my next date night! P.S please excuse the wrinkles I need to iron it Read more
items.author: Kim

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!!
items.body: Sexy, comfortable dress. You have to wear shorts underneath due to it being shorter in the back. Especially if you have a big booty like me lol. Wore this to a wedding with black knee high cowboy boots and it was a look! Casual dress for anywhere. Can dress it up or down. Love it. Just wish length in back was a little longer Read more
items.author: beautiful

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plus size girl approved
items.body: First dress Iâ€™ve bought that fit perfectly and met my expectations. Only flaw is a synthetic fabric smell that even after washing I can still smell a hint of but depending on what you use in your laundry (scent boosters) it could fix that. The material is thick and stretchy, almost like a swimwear fabric but not quite itâ€™s hard for me to describe. The sleeves are my favorite part honestly. When Iâ€™ve bought other dresses the cuffing on the arms would irritate my skin or feel like my arm flab is getting cut off OR like the arm sleeve is too loose/ gaping and never seemed flattering for my arms so this is exactly what I wanted and is much much more flattering. I love this dress, I can envision several ways to style it, I bought it for a salsa class and it goes great with my heels but I can also imagine tights and a thigh high boot and a jacket for a winter look. I have an apron belly and Iâ€™m 100% comfortable and confident in this dress. Read more
items.author: Abby

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weird fabric
items.body: It's cute, but the material is really weird, and changes the vibe of the dress. It's like a swimsuit material/athletic wear material...so it makes the dress look like fancy work out dress instead of a dinner/party dress. Color was true to image and length was ok for me at 5'8 Read more
items.author: T

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars cute but....
items.body: super cute color and cut but it was pulled on the bottom hem Read more
items.author: Marcia Maciel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So flattering
items.body: So flattering. It is very slimming, it stretches nice, it has an athletic material feel. I am between a size M and L and went with a M and it fits perfectly! Read more
items.author: ðŸ¥°ðŸ¥³

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little black dress!
items.body: This dress is so cute! It feels like an athletic material which is so comfortable and breathable. Not super thick, but does have a comfortable compression to it! I love the way it fits and the style especially around the tummy area. The quality is very well made! Would definitely purchase this in another color! Read more
items.author: Kat Bitton

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Wine Red, White, Royal Blue, Light Green, Black, Light Pink, Light Purple, Light Yellow, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
